```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggforce)
library(ggrepel)
cluster_labels <- umap %>% 
  group_by(seurat_clusters, CellType_predict) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(CellType_predict)) %>% 
  summarise(Count = n(), x = mean(UMAP_1), y = mean(UMAP_2)) %>% 
  mutate(freq = Count / sum(Count)) %>% 
  filter(freq > 0.3) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  group_by(seurat_clusters) %>% 
  summarise(seurat_cluster_CellType_predict = paste0(CellType_predict, collapse = ', '),
            x = mean(x), y = mean(y)) %>% 
  mutate(seurat_cluster_CellType_predict_num = paste0(seurat_clusters, ' (', seurat_cluster_CellType_predict, ')'))



umap %>% left_join(., cluster_labels) %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_point(aes(x=UMAP_1, y = UMAP_2, colour = CellType_predict), size = 0.1, alpha = 0.5) + 
  #guides(colour = guide_legend(override.aes = list(size=10, alpha = 1))) + 
  theme_cowplot() + 
  geom_label_repel(data = cluster_labels, aes(x=x, y=y, label = seurat_cluster_CellType_predict_num )) +
  scale_color_manual(values = as.vector(pals::alphabet())) + 
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5))


umap %>% left_join(., cluster_labels) %>% 
    mutate(Time = integration_group,
           CellType_predict = gsub('Rod Bipolar Cells', 'Bipolar Cells', CellType_predict), 
           Labelling = case_when(Paper == 'Hufnagel 2020' ~ 'Homo sapiens (Stem) (Hufnagel 2020)',
                                 TRUE ~ paste0(organism, ' (', study_accession, ')'))) %>% 
    sample_n(10000) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=mnnUMAP_1, y = mnnUMAP_2)) + 
    geom_point(size = 0.1, alpha = 0.5) + 
    guides(colour = guide_legend(override.aes = list(size=10, alpha = 1))) + 
    theme_cowplot() + 
    geom_mark_hull(aes(label = seurat_cluster_CellType_predict_num), concavity = 5) +
    scale_color_manual(values = as.vector(pals::alphabet())) + 
    scale_fill_manual(values = as.vector(pals::alphabet())) + 
    theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5))
```
